standard.name: Poké Ball
standard.description: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It is thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.

standard.name: Great Ball
standard.description: A good, high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a standard Poké Ball.

standard.name: Ultra Ball
standard.description: An ultra-high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a Great Ball.

exclusive.name: Net Ball
exclusive.description: More effective in catching Water or Bug type Pokémon.

exclusive.name: Dive Ball
exclusive.description: Works especially well with Pokémon that live underwater.

exclusive.name: Luxury Ball
exclusive.description: A comfortable Poké Ball, Pokémon quickly grow friendly after being caught.

apricorn.name: Moon Ball
apricorn.description: Makes it easier to catch Pokémon that can evolve using a Moon Stone.

apricorn.name: Friend Ball
apricorn.description: Makes Pokémon caught in this Poké Ball more friendly towards you immediately.

event.name: Premier Ball
event.description: Somewhat rare, made as a commerative item used to celebrate an event of some sort.

event.name: Cherish Ball
event.description: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.
